Select your typical account balance to trade such products
Select the percentage of your account balance you typically risk when trading

Income after deduction of financial obligations, such as: loan payments, rent, expenses, etc.

Equities, bonds and similar investment products
Select the estimated value of your liquid investments
Do you have relevant qualification(s) that would assist your understanding of trading?

Please answer all the questions to continue
I would not like to proceed
Accept the declaration below to proceed
I will familiarise myself with funBUX, the relevant products and educational material beforehand and will proceed only if I feel comfortable to do so.
You indicated that you don\'t want to proceed with your application
You\'ve been doing great. Please keep practicing some more with funBUX.

You indicated that you don\'t want to proceed with your application. We recommend that you practice some more with funBUX. Here\'s %1$d funBUX.\n\nPlease come back when you feel ready to trade with real money.
You indicated that you don\'t want to proceed with your application. We recommend that you practice some more with funBUX. \n\nPlease come back when you feel ready to trade with real money.

Based on the information you have provided to us, specifically in relation to your knowledge and experience, it appears that you are unlikely to fully understand the risks and potential financial costs of trading CFDs. Therefore, trading with real money may not be appropriate for you and we recommend you to consider if you still want to proceed.

If you still want to continue, we urge you to only do so after trading with funBUX (our demo account), as well as reviewing our educational material and risk warning notice for CFDs. Requesting independent advice may also help.

Please remember that CFDs are leveraged products and carry a high level of risk. Your capital is at risk so please make sure you understand the risks. CFDs may not be suitable for all customers.

If you still want to continue, please accept the declaration below. If there are any questions about any aspect of the application or product then please contact our Customer Support team.
Select your primary source of funds you\'ll use for trading
Select your primary source of funds you\'ll use for trading
Note: After tapping ‘Done’ you will no longer be able to go back and change any information.
It’s taking too long to create your account
Customer Support will be in touch shortly to help you out
Please wait while we create your account
Unable to connect to BUX X
Don\'t miss out on our promotions, make sure we can reach you.
Important: Help us keep your account safe by adding an email address
We have sent a verification link to:
What do you need to keep an eye on while trading? Subscribe to our newsletter.
Please ensure the name on your personal bank account matches your BUX X account name
You are two steps away from setting up your account for IBAN transfers
This information is required for \'Anti-money laundering\' purposes and will be used in accordance with our Privacy Notice
Take a picture of a recent personal bank statement

You will receive a push notification once this account is approved for withdrawals.\n\nIt may take 2 to 5 work days to approve your bank statement. If you have questions about your status, please contact Customer Support.
Your bank account (IBAN) is pending approval
The bank account holder is not the same as the seriousBUX account holder

Not all required info was clearly visible on the picture of the bank statement.

We need to be able to read the following:
- Account holder name
- Address
- IBAN
- Date
We were unable to read the details on the bank statement. Please provide a clearer picture with all the required info.
Don\'t worry, we\'re not interested in your account balance so you have the option to erase this information from the picture.
Please take a picture of a recent bank statement or select an image from your library. The picture should include the following details:
The %s was copied to your clipboard
You will receive a push notification, once your money is available on your BUX X account.
You will receive a push notification once your money is available on your BUX X account. You will be required to set up a PIN code at that moment.
The name on your personal bank account must match your seriousBUX account name
It seems like the minimum number of participants wasn\'t achieved before the start time
An error happened while loading the Battle Chat. Please try again later.
The message could not be sent. Please try again later.

The Battle is a short-term trading competition. The trader with the highest return on their total account value by the end of the Battle wins. Here you can chat with fellow Battle participants and also see their trades. \n\nGood luck!
Game over. Let\'s do it again.
In Battles, you can chat with the other participants, check out their trades and ask questions. Take a look.
This is a trading competition. The trader with the best trading results at the end of the Battle wins. Good luck!
You’ve just joined your first Battle
Are you sure you want to delete the Battle %s?
We\'ll notify you once they accept your request
So I can invite you to private Battles
Your device is in Airplane Mode. Please disable it in Settings and try again.

This amount is below the required minimum
You seem to be offline. Please check if Wi-fi or mobile data is turned on, then restart the app.
Amount to cover potential future charges like the closing fee or financing fee. This way we can guarantee you never lose more than what you have deposited into your account.
Cash you can use to open new positions. It is equal to your Cash minus the Ring fenced amount.

Trading Capacity (a.k.a. margin) is your total account value relative to your total invested amount. Keep in mind that when this percentage becomes less than 50%, we\'re required to close a position. Check the Coach articles for more info.
Cash you can withdraw from your account at any given moment. When you have open positions it is equal to your Cash minus the Ring fenced amount. With no open positions it\'s the same as Cash.

Disclaimer: All views, opinions or analysis expressed in articles are that of the author and do not represent the views of BUX. Neither BUX nor the author provides financial advice and these articles should not be construed as such.
Follow this Channel, and learn from other traders.
There are already %1$d members in the Channel. You can only add %2$d more.
Your position cannot be closed via the app at this moment. Please try again later.
Your position cannot be closed via the app at this moment. To close your position, contact Support immediately.

Trading can be rewarding, but you can also lose money. That\'s why we\'ve applied some Responsible Trading principles to your trading account. Hopefully, this helps you manage your risk responsibly. You can read more about these principles on getbux.com.

The activities of the BUX X app are regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA). All real money accounts (seriousBUX) fall under the guarantee of the Financial Services Compensation Scheme. That means the money on your account is safe up to 50.000 GBP. Obviously, any trading losses you may incur don\'t fall under this guarantee.

Important: Once you deposit money you will only see your seriousBUX account. You can return to your funBUX account if your account value falls below the minimum required to open a trade. CFDs are high-risk investments.
It only takes a few minutes
You may now continue your application
Your proof of address has been accepted
We could not verify your address
Your proof of address has been declined
Your account is ready, remember that from now on you\'re trading with real money.
To protect your seriousBUX account you\'ll need to set a PIN code of 5 digits
Let\'s rock the world of finance
It looks like you\'re about to stop trading for real

You return to the funBUX account you had before you went serious, including all the stats and the funBUX amount.\n\nYour seriousBUX account will stay where it is and you can go back to it in a similar way like you did the first time.
When you do, you should know the following:
Would you like to withdraw your money before switching?
Great to see you\'re going back to seriousBUX

You return to the seriousBUX account you had before you went back to funBUX, including all the stats and real money account balance - if any.\n\nYour funBUX account will stay where it is and you can go back to it in a similar way like you did the first time.
When you upgrade again you should know the following:
There is no lower limit set
There is no upper limit set
There is no Auto Close set
A trade you matched has been closed with a loss. Check your position.
A trade you matched has been closed with a profit. Check your position.
A trade you challenged has been closed with a loss. Check your position.
A trade you challenged has been closed with a profit. Check your position.
The position will be also shared in the selected Channels when closing it
No Channels to share the trade were found
All the progress will be gone
Are you sure you want to close this screen?
You can\'t share this position because it has been automatically closed
What\'s your plan for this trade?
Starting now, we will send you daily account reports. Opt-out from receiving daily emails in the app\'s Settings under Notifications.
We advise you to start small but not too small. After all, you\'ll have to make more profit out of every trade and that\'s not easy.
"Keep in mind! Depositing low amounts makes profiting difficult. You will need to make more from each trade you make. "

*The CFD services of BUX X are provided by ayondo markets Limited. ayondo markets Limited is authorised and regulated by the UK Financial Conduct Authority. In accordance with The Money Laundering Regulations 2007, we are unable to accept third-party payments. All client accounts must be funded using the account holders own funds.
Please deposit with a bank account which is registered under your name (as per your identity document). Otherwise, the deposit will not go through.
We do not accept deposits from business accounts or third parties*

The Coach offers various types of important information about trading with BUX X. It explains the features and functionalities of the app as well as providing you with useful trading tips. Essentially everything you need to know to become better at playing the markets.
This email is linked to another BUX X account. Please provide another one.

Thanks for helping us improve our service.
We super appreciate any and all feedback and suggestions you might have, so please feel free to drop us a line at feedback@getbux.com and let us know what you think.
Rate BUX X on Google Play

* Terms & Conditions apply to all promos
To collect your real money rewards you need to upgrade to seriousBUX first.\n\nOn your seriousBUX account, the rewards become available by making trades.

\'Rewards - Pending trading fees\' are real money rewards that are activated when you trade. The reward becomes redeemable after you\'ve made sufficient trades to cover the full amount.\n\nOnce the reward is redeemable you can redeem it anytime by tapping the \'Redeem\' button.
How do you get the real money rewards?
We also offer you %1$s in real money if you upgrade to seriousBUX before %2$s.
That wasn\'t too difficult, was it? Actually, the real difficulty with trading is knowing what to trade and when to trade it. This is why we have several ways to inspire and inform you.
You\'ll always see the details of the trade once you\'ve confirmed it. This opened position will then appear in your POSITIONS screen.
Brilliant! You have a position in Gold.

What\'s happening in the world of finance? What should I know before making a trade? Here you\'ll find up to date news, written by BUX X, and user activity in real time. Check the tabs: All, Stars and Friends.
Check out your stats, find and connect with BUX X friends, and set your preferences in Settings. You can also contact the Support Team if you have any queries and send feedback.

Learn from experienced traders by following their Channels. Join Battles to compete with other users and join Groups to communicate with members of the BUX X community. Make your trading experience a social one.
Opening and closing are simple. The hard part of trading is knowing what to trade and when. BUX X has several ways to inspire and inform you.
Let\'s rock the world of finance
You\'ll always see the details of the trade once you\'ve confirmed it
Let\'s close your test position. The first tap on the button reveals the fee, the second confirms the closure.
Your open position is being updated in real time.\n\nYou can keep any positions open for as long as you like.
This is the amount you want to start your trade with.\n\nThe Multiplier increases your potential profit or loss. Note that it\'s optional and should be handled with caution.
Tap UP if you think the price of this particular product is going to go up. Tap DOWN if you think it is going to go down. Simple.
The first tap on the Trade button reveals the fee you\'ll be charged. Go ahead. Remember, this is only a test trade.
The second tap confirms the trade and opens your position at the most recent price.
Don\'t miss all the exciting news and tips from BUX X
You\'ll always see the details of the trade once you\'ve confirmed it
Let\'s close your test position. The first tap on the button reveals the fee, the second confirms the closure.
Choose the direction, amount and Multiplier, and tap Trade.\n\nNote that the Multiplier is optional and should be handled with caution.
You\'re about to open and close a position in Gold. You\'ll learn the basics of trading with BUX X.
You can see the fee you\'ll be charged for this trade. Tap Go to confirm and open your position.
Before you get started, let\'s do a test trade with Gold. After all, the best way to learn is by doing. Remember, trading is about opening and closing a position.
You\'re about to open and close a position in Gold. You\'ll learn the basics of trading with BUX X.
Let\'s just focus on the basics first
You\'ll learn more about this later

You can keep any positions open for as long as you like, but for the sake of this test, we\'ll show you how to close a position. The first tap on the button reveals the fee, the second tap confirms the closure.
Close this test position and reveal fee
Here you can see a summary of your open position updated in real time. Here you can also check out additional features such as Charts, Alerts & Auto Close and Net result.
This is the amount you want to open your trade with. With BUX X you can\'t lose more than the amount you select here.
Tap UP if you think the price of this particular product is going to go up. Tap DOWN if you think it is going to go down. Simple.
Now you\'re all set. The first tap on the Trade button will reveal the fee you\'ll be charged. Tap it. Remember, this is only a test trade.
The Multiplier increases your potential profit or loss. Note that it\'s optional and should be handled with caution.
The second tap confirms the trade and opens your position at the most recent price.

Hi,

Let's start trading with BUX X! You can begin with a demo account and switch to real money trading whenever you feel like it.

Download the app here: %1$s , create an account and when asked for a friend’s username, fill in mine: %2$s .

Happy trading!

Sorry, but we\'re temporarily down for maintenance to provide you with the best experience possible. Normally, this takes place outside business hours (Monday till Friday, 08:00-21:00 UK time), but rest assured, we\'ll do our best to be back shortly. In the meantime, you can continue to practice your trading skills with funBUX.

We mean it! We promise to take great care of your data, storing it safely and using it to help you explore the world of BUX X and to offer you a better trading experience.

To improve your BUX X experience, we may share your personal data with social media channels. The information you provide will be paired with data in their systems. This helps us better market our products and offer you a customized experience. Good for BUX and you.

To learn what happens under the hood, please check the BUX %1$s. Read this document carefully and remember that you can opt out at any time by tapping %2$s or by following the instructions outlined in the BUX Privacy Notice. You’re in the lead!

If you have any questions, please get in touch with us. We are happy to help!

The Motorola DynaTac 8000X was the first predecessor of your modern day smartphone. Approved by the FCC on the 21st of September 1983, it became the first commercially available mobile phone.\n\nThe DynaTAC offered a convenient 30 minutes of talk time and roughly 8 hours of standby. It weighed nearly one kilogram, had an advanced LED display and it\'s retail price was a whopping $3,995.
The Dynamic Adaptive Total Area Coverage 8000X

The BUX %s and %s have been updated in line with new regulations. To continue trading, please indicate that you agree to the updated terms and confirm that you have read the updated Privacy Notice. Additionally, please confirm that you are aged 18 years or older.

CNMV Risk Warning

CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 77.7\%% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider. You should consider whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

Please note that if you decide to close your position, your total costs will be around %1$s.

Keep Trading notifications ON to stay on top of your game. Know what\'s happening on the markets and benefit from the latest BUX X promotions.
Want more privacy? Manage the visibility of your account value by swiping the Cash icon, to either hide or show the current amount.

By default, your trading and social activity is only visible to BUXsters from the same country. You can change this by enabling the International setting. Additionally, you can choose to share your trades with your friends only. This applies to all trades that appear in the activity feed.
When you create a BUX X account, you give us permission to use your details for marketing purposes. You can withdraw your consent anytime, by sending an email to support@getbux.com.

Your available cash for withdrawal is calculated taking into account ongoing trades and fees. The minimum is 10.00 unless your account balance is less than that. In that case, you can only withdraw the full amount with a minimum of 1.00.
Your money will be transferred within five working days

At the moment, for ​this type of withdrawal, funds will be debited from your account only when the request has been ​manually processed by Customer Support.\n\nPlease note that opening subsequent positions after this request may have an impact on the amount that can be returned to you.
